I took my family here for the decor but I forgot that with the cutesy decor comes small children.  If you don't mind that, read on.  We were greeted happily when we walked in and made to feel welcome.  The servers do not speak English well so if you have specifics to your order, they may get lost in translation.  Other than that, the food was delicious and satisfying.  I had the pancakes that have bacon on them and left quite full!  A good meal!
